item.title: 两位与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关系疏远的美国共和党州长现在已经为特朗普背书，而之前处于观望状态的其他保守派领导人也在大选初期向特朗普抛出了橄榄枝。
item.description:
Two GOP governors who had distant relationships with Donald Trump have now issued endorsements, as other conservative leaders previously on the sidelines also throw their support to Trump in the early stages of the general election.https://t.co/rxJ9Dj9fG7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 经过几个月的药物治疗周期后，这位 37 岁的阿拉巴马州妇女准备在 3 月 4 日进行胚胎移植。但是，阿拉巴马州最高法院 2 月 16 日的裁决颠覆了她的治疗方案。
item.description:
After months of medication cycles, this 37-year-old Alabama woman was gearing up for an embryo transfer on March 4. But the Alabama Supreme Court's decision on Feb. 16 upended the course of her treatment. https://t.co/TUimD1eQ0g

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统将于今晚发表年度国情咨文演讲，以下是您需要了解的演讲内容和观看方式。

Pres. Joe Biden will deliver his annual State of the Union address tonight.

Here's what you need to know about the speech and how to watch.https://t.co/QWERwjTiLS

item.title: 2012 年，美国记者詹姆斯-福里在报道叙利亚内战时被 ISIS 恐怖分子绑架，两年后被该组织公开斩首。
item.description:
In 2012, American journalist James Foley was kidnapped by ISIS terrorists while he was covering the Syrian civil war and was publicly beheaded by the group two years later.

Now, his mother is telling his story in a new book. https://t.co/W4HZ3PlubO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 📸:传说，如果把一枚硬币扔进罗马许愿池，就意味着你将回到永恒之城。但是，游客留在那里的现金会怎么样呢？
item.description:
📸: Legend says that if you throw a coin over your shoulder into Rome's Trevi Fountain it means you will return to the Eternal City. But what happens to the cash tourists leave there? pic.twitter.com/g2ky7wfTb3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 周四，纽约一名法官驳回了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的暂时推迟对 E. Jean Carroll 诽谤案处罚的请求，留给这位前总统三天时间来支付或交纳全部 8,330 万美元判决的保证金。
item.description:
A New York judge on Thursday denied Donald Trump's request for a temporary delay of the penalties in E. Jean Carroll's defamation case, leaving the former president three days to pay or post a bond for the entire $83.3 million judgment. https://t.co/N3HXv2YJo7 pic.twitter.com/NRF5cgyty2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑莉暂停总统竞选活动似乎证实了唐纳德-特朗普在美国共和党内的巨无霸地位--但这可能揭示了其党内的潜在分歧，并自相矛盾地有助于保持其凝聚力。
item.description:
Nikki Haley suspending her presidential campaign seemed to confirm Donald Trump's juggernaut status within the GOP — but it may have illuminated the underlying divisions within her party and paradoxically helped maintain its cohesion. https://t.co/antbVfwlRv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 皇家加勒比游轮公司的一名员工被指控在客舱浴室内藏匿摄像头，以监视包括未成年少女在内的游客。
item.description:
A Royal Caribbean cruise employee is accused of hiding cameras inside bathrooms of passenger cabins to spy on guests, including underage girls. https://t.co/9fVZja17Bm pic.twitter.com/7nFqUyAud5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在阿拉巴马州最高法院关于冷冻胚胎是 "儿童 "的判决引发的政治风波中，乔-拜登总统预计将利用周四的国情咨文演讲将自己和民主党人塑造成生殖自由的捍卫者。
item.description:
Amid the political fallout over the Alabama Supreme Court decision that frozen embryos are "children," Pres. Joe Biden is expected to use his State of the Union address Thursday to cast himself, and Democrats, as defenders of reproductive freedom.https://t.co/ebCZyHy0zG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 凯特.考克斯（Kate Cox）今年早些时候被德克萨斯州最高法院拒绝紧急堕胎，她将作为嘉宾出席拜登总统的 #SOTU.She 和达姆拉.卡桑（Damla Karsan）博士在演讲前加入 @RachelVScott 的行列，她们希望这次演讲能够突出生殖权利。
item.description:
Kate Cox — who was denied an emergency abortion by the Texas Supreme Court earlier this year — will be a guest at Pres. Biden’s #SOTU.

She and Dr. Damla Karsan join @RachelVScott ahead of the address, which they hope will spotlight reproductive rights. https://t.co/c4vr8i45Tf pic.twitter.com/VI5yOzBgUE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 根据立法者提交给共和党州长罗恩-德桑蒂斯（Ron DeSantis）的一项法案，佛罗里达州将禁止无家可归者在公共场所扎营或露宿。

item.title: 失控的马匹一辆汽车上的围观者拍摄到的画面显示，周六，一对放纵的警马在克利夫兰高速公路上飞奔。官员说，这两匹马已经安全返回。
item.description:
RUNAWAY HORSES: Footage captured by onlookers in a car shows a pair of loose police horses galloping down a Cleveland highway Saturday. The two horses have since been returned safely, officials say. https://t.co/cWJf37WRyC pic.twitter.com/VrmB7xcway

item.title: 演员、制片人兼喜剧演员约翰-莱吉扎莫多年来一直在为拉美裔在好莱坞代表性不足的问题敲响警钟。现在，研究和咨询公司麦肯锡公司的一份新报告提供了数据支持。
item.description:
Actor, producer and comedian John Leguizamo has been sounding the alarm on underrepresentation of Latinos in Hollywood for years.

item.title: 根据新的研究，美国一些沿海城市正在 "消失 "在地面上，这可能会在不久的将来进一步加剧海平面上升的复杂性。
